Title: Relates to the empire state apprenticeship grant program for small business and not-for-profit corporations
Summary: Relates to the empire state apprenticeship grant program for small business and not-for-profit corporations; provides for state matching funds to eligible entities not to exceed fifty thousand dollars annually.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to the empire state apprenticeship grant program for small business and not-for-profit corporations
